title: Prohibits, unless authorized by state law, municipalities from authorizing local law enforcement to enforce any provision of federal immigration law
summary: Prohibits, unless authorized by state law, municipalities from authorizing or requiring local law enforcement to enforce any provision of federal immigration law, rule or regulation; requires establishment of a civilian review board in each municipality authorized to enforce federal immigration law to review actions and report on actions relating to such enforcement.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting municipal corporations from empowering local police officers and peace officers to enforce any provision of federal immigration law, rule or regulation
